definition[0]: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples
example[0]: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
example[1]: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
definition[1]: to be an example which shows that something is true or that a fact exists
example[2]: This illustrates a fundamental weakness in the system.
example[3]: This dispute illustrates that the regime is deeply divided.
example[4]: The following examples illustrate how this operates in practice.
definition[2]: to put pictures in a book, article etc
example[5]: Over a hundred diagrams, tables and pictures illustrate the book.
